misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes that a variable serving as a loop counter (currentRowIndex) cannot also serve directly as the limit for a nested loop, necessitating the creation of a 'proxy' variable (a) to hold the value.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: In Java's execution model, variables are simple storage locations that can be read multiple times in any context within their scope; there is no restriction on using a loop counter as a termination condition for a nested loop.
